naslov: Apartmanski kompleks, Pještata, Pelješac, 451,83 m2, prvi red do mora! (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju apartmanski kompleks, 451,83 m2, Pještata, Pelješac.   Kompleks se sastoji od tri povezana objekta izgrađena 1990. godine. Nije priključen na gradski vodovod i odvodnju već ima vlastitu vodu (gusterna) i sabirnu jamu. Suterenski dio ima ukupno 89,27 m2, prizemlje 179,22 m2, a kat 83,34 m2. Obuhvaća ukupno 10 apartmana i visoko roh bau potkrovlje od dodatnih 100 m2 u kojem su predviđena još tri apartmana.   Četiri apartmana su jednosobna, a šest je dvosobnih. Svaki ima svoju kupaonicu, kuhinju te zaseban ulaz i izlaz na balkon.   Opremljeni su internetom, televizijom i klima uređajem kojim se hlade ili griju po potrebi. Na parceli su, za zajedničko korištenje, velika terasa s fantastičnim pogledom na more i Pelješki most, ugrađeni roštilj blizu obale, bazen i privatna betonirana plaža. Kompleks se nalazi na stijeni koja se spušta u more te je izgrađen u skladu s prirodnim karakteristikama terena. Dio parcele uz more se kaskadnim vrtom spušta do plaže i obale.   Na prilaznom dijelu parcele je ravan dio terena na kojem je više od deset parkirališnih mjesta. Kompleks ima četverostranu orijentaciju i okupan je suncem.   Vlasnik trenutno dovršava legalizaciju objekta i otkup zemljišta na kojem je izgrađen. Uskoro će biti definirana i konačna veličina parcele koja je na prodaju. Ovaj zanimljiv objekt bi, uz investiranje u njegovu djelomičnu adaptaciju i završetak projekta, bio pun pogodak za iznajmljivače. Zbog brojnosti jedinica za iznajmljivanje i popratnih sadržaja koji su već organizirani na parceli, te izvanredne lokacije tik do mora i s fantastičnim pogledom, uspjeh je zagarantiran. Svakako pogledajte ovu izazovnu nekretninu! Za sva pitanja kontakt telefon 098 / 915 - 5643 ( Ivan ) LORETA NEKRETNINE Loreta Usluge Office: Tel: 01 / 3866 - 844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10 000 Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com Apartment   complex   for   sale  ,   451  .  83   m2  ,   Pještata  ,   Pelješac  . The   complex   consists   of   three   connected   buildings   built   in   1990  .   It   is   not   connected   to   the   city   water   supply   and   drainage  ,   but   has   its   own   water   (  cistern  )   and   a   collection   pit  . The   basement   has   a   total   of   89  .  27   m2  ,   the   ground   floor   179  .  22   m2  ,   and   the   first   floor   83  .  34   m2  .   It   includes   a   total   of   10   apartments   and   a   high   roh   bau   attic   of   an   additional   100   m2   in   which   three   more   apartments   are   planned  .   Four   apartments   are   one  -  bedroom  ,   and   six   are   two  -  bedroom  . Each   has   its   own   bathroom  ,   kitchen   and   separate   entrance   and   exit   to   the   balcony  .   They   are   equipped   with   internet  ,   television   and   air   conditioning   to   cool   or   heat   as   needed  . On   the   plot  ,   for   shared   use  ,   there   is   a   large   terrace   with   a   fantastic   view   of   the   sea   and   the   Pelješac   Bridge  ,   a   built  -in   barbecue   near   the   shore  ,   a   swimming   pool   and   a   private   paved   beach  .   The   complex   is   located   on   a   rock   that   descends   into   the   sea   and   was   built   in   accordance   with   the   natural   characteristics   of   the   terrain  .   Part   of   the   plot   by   the   sea   descends   through   a   cascading   garden   to   the   beach   and   the   coast  . On   the   access   part   of   the   plot   there   is   a   flat   part   of   the   terrain   with   more   than   ten   parking   spaces  .   The   complex   has   a   four  -  sided   orientation   and   is   bathed   in   the   sun  .   The   owner   is   currently   completing   the   legalization   of   the   building   and   the   purchase   of the   land   on   which   it   was   built  .   The   final   size   of   the   plot   for   sale   will   soon   be   defined  .   This   interesting   facility  ,   along   with   investing   in   its   partial   adaptation   and   completion   of   the   project  ,   would   be   a   complete   hit   for   renters  .   Due   to   the   number   of   rental   units   and   accompanying   facilities   that   are   already   organized   on   the   plot  ,   and   the   excellent   location   right   next   to   the   sea   and   with   a   fantastic   view  ,   success   is   guaranteed  . Be   sure   to   check   out   this   challenging   property  ! For   all   questions   contact   phone   098   /   915   -   5643   (   Ivan   ) LORETA   REAL   ESTATE Loreta   Services   Office  :   Tel  :   01   /   3866   -   844 Zagrebačka avenija 100a, 10   000   Zagreb www.loreta-nekretnine.com ID KOD AGENCIJE: 49 Ivan Bošković Agent s licencom Mob: 098/9155-643 Tel: 01/3866 844 E-mail: ivan.boskovic@loreta.hr www.loreta.hr
